QuestData.Title: Amber Arms
QuestData.Description: You! Filth!$B$BYou work for me now!$B$BThe amber blades of the Shek'zeer Bladesworn are the finest weapons in the empire.$B$BIf you are not impaled upon them immediately after leaving here, bring me as many of the blades as you can carry! I want to make sure we have weapons in reserve, should we need them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 6 Amber Blades from Shek'zeer Bladesworn around the Heart of Fear and The Clutches of Shek'zeer.$B$BSpeak with Kil'ruk the Wind-Reaver at Klaxxi'vess for a ride to the Heart of Fear.
QuestData.CompletionText: The bladesworn carry their swords with pride. I want them on my weapon racks!
QuestData.RewardText: If all goes as planned, the Klaxxi will stop the Empress without your help. Still, it is my role to be prepared.
